faq.question: Is there a free Descript alternative?
faq.answer: Kapwing offers text-based editing with free tier. CapCut is completely free with auto-captions. Neither matches Descript's full feature set, but capable for basic needs.

faq.question: Best for podcasters?
faq.answer: Riverside.fm if you need recording too. Descript still strong for podcast editing. Otter.ai for transcription-only. Depends on workflow needs.

faq.question: Can I edit video by text elsewhere?
faq.answer: Kapwing and Riverside offer text-based editing. Less refined than Descript but functional. Traditional editors with good transcription (Premiere) offer similar workflow.

faq.question: Is Descript worth the price?
faq.answer: For heavy podcast/video editing with text-based workflow, yes. For occasional use, free alternatives work. Evaluate based on time saved vs cost.
